overview:
I am a sales executive and my passion is helping companies grow. I do this by thinking outside the box, recognizing the right opportunities, being an innovator, developing talent, exceeding goals, presenting value and using a Golden Rolodex. My track record shows consistent double digit sales and profit increases.

Named one of the 50 most powerful people in the multimedia industry, I am a leader, a builder, a problem-solver and a motivator who has built sales forces and companies.

I built a company from the ground up. From start to finish, I oversaw its transformation from an idea into a profitable $100M business.

Over the course of my career, I have consulted and raised millions of dollars for companies in the US and the UK, with a particular emphasis on the IT and biotechnology sectors.

I have worked with Fortune 500 companies to measure, manage, analyze and improve their customer service, customer satisfaction and customer loyalty.

I have been a frequent speaker and panelist at the Software Publishers Association (SPA) conferences, have hosted a weekly radio talkshow and have also authored several trade publication articles. Specialties

Strategic thinker, leader and planner who has developed multi-million dollar sales programs with national retailers, brands and government entities. A proactive executive with a consistent record for developing and implementing proven business strategies while increasing bottom-line revenue and achieving profit-driven goals. A golden rolodex has led to many successes.
